name: PracticeSpellings
0:
”Alexa, open practice spellings”
”Let’s do fourth grade”
”Tell me the next word”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: practice spellings
des:
This skill helps kids to learn spellings either to prepare for spelling be or just for fun. 
You can launch the skill by saying "Alexa, open practice spellings". You can then choose to practice words from any grade from Kindergarten to fifth. Alexa will say the word and then you can either ask to repeat or call for the next word.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
